name: DigitalMarketingNow
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Want to learn how to grow your business, startup, or personal brand by utilizing the newest in digital marketing trends? Madeleine Duprez, the founder of social media marketing company Scalar Agency, shares skills and tips to grow your brand awareness to deliver your message to the right audience. Digital Marketing Now covers topics like social media marketing, advancements in technology, website conversion, web accessibility, artificial intelligence (AI) and SEO tactics. Tune in daily for important information to help your growing business!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
